title: Agente Shuffle's SCiPTEMBER 2022 Illustrations
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:scp-archive]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:bhl-dark-sidebar]]
[[module CSS]]
:root {
  --header-title: "SCiPTEMBER II";
  --header-subtitle: "Artistic Boogaloo";
}
[[/module]]
[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-source= --]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-colors= --]
|color-family=dark
|bg-color=#fff
|txt-color=#333
|border-color=#465a4b
|label-bg-color=#465a4b
|label-txt-color=#ffffff
]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=1
|display-name= DAY 1 - FACTORY
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-es-261 SCP-ES-261]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **The Flavor Of The Stars And Juno's Desolation**
= {{The brand is displayed as "Cosmic Cream" and "In collaboration with The Factory!" with the image of an elliptical galaxy in the background.}}
= **by [[*user RevenantHeimdall]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP1.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=2
|display-name= DAY 2 - REANIMATION
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-2996]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **ERROR / ERROR**
= {{I am an unbound spirit of torment, you mortal wraith. I will not have words with you. I will not stop until I can squeeze the life out of his writhing throat.}}
= **by [[*user djkaktus]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP2.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=3
|display-name= DAY 3 - TWISTED PINES
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-2106]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **A Conspiracy Of Ravens**
= {{They love it! I like being a raven because it makes everything so simple. They like being me because it makes everything so complex.}}
= **by [[*user Jacob Conwell]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP3.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=4
|display-name= DAY 4 - APIAN
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-2401]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **Mary Had A Little Lamb**
= {{No. Fuck that. Do me a favor though, see that button for the incinerator?}}
= **by [[*user LurkD]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP4.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=5
|display-name= DAY 5 - SKELETAL
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-6345]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **Huesos Malos ("Bad Bones")**
= {{La Trituradora de Huesos, everyone!}}
= **by [[*user J Dune]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP5.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=6
|display-name= DAY 6 - FUTURE
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[http://lafundacionscp.wikidot.com/scp-es-253 SCP-ES-253]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **To Win One Must Be One Of Them**
= {{The call has interference throughout its duration. The words "help", "plague" and "yellow" are heard before ending with a siren sound.}}
= **by [[*user morhadow]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP6.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=7
|display-name= DAY 7 - CLOCKWORK
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-4511]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **SWINE GOD.**
= {{//You can't win!// If you kill me, //it// wins. And you'll never let //it// win.}}
= **by [[*user Rounderhouse]], [[*user DrAnnoyingDog]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP7.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=8
|display-name= DAY 8 - HIVE-MIND
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-4064]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"It's Not You, It's Us"**
= {{Did you say, my sister? Am I not the only one? How many more have you taken?}}
= **by [[*user Henzoid]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP8.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=9
|display-name= DAY 9 - COOL WAR 2
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-4066]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"The Byzantine Empire Was Secretly Aliens"**
= {{An emperor of an empire that has no emperor. The sun in reverse, rising west and falling east. Betrayal leads to slavery leads to betrayal.}}
= **by [[*user ch00bakka]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP9.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=10
|display-name= DAY 10 - RANINE
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-3227]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"Dart Frog Flora"**
= {{He didn't even have time to defend himself, they just ripped right through him.}}
= **by [[*user Moohab]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP10.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=11
|display-name= DAY 11 - EURTEC
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-2744|TATTLETALE]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"[ENTRY REMOVED FROM DATABASE]"**
= {{Take a look around. You're here to help with the investigation, right?}}
= **by [[*user JakdragonX]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP11.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=12
|display-name= DAY 12 - WILSON'S WILDLIFE
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/rescate-pozo-espantozo RESCUE MISSION: THE SPOOKY WELL!]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= {{The beast you captured escaped from the truck and has killed over 150 people in a cruel, bloody, senseless massacre.}}
= **by [[*user Dc_Yerko]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP12.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=13
|display-name= DAY 13 - MOON
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-es-191 SCP-ES-191]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= ##blue|**"Stellar Garden"**##
= {{We left these flowers as the only way not to forget your actions, a flower to remember our birthplace.}}
= **by [[*user Luis Gm]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP13.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=14
|display-name= DAY 14 - MINIATURE
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-4074]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"Sun Flower"**
= {{If you're tired of hiding and running, I'll understand if you leave. You deserve a better man.}}
= **by [[*user AlleraRey]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP14.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=15
|display-name= DAY 15 - MAP
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-5195]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"Trick Shot"**
= {{We know what you're doing, and we know how you're doing it. This is your one and only opportunity to walk away.}}
= **by [[*user The Great Hippo]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP15.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=16
|display-name= DAY 16 - DENTAL
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-6696]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"Dr. Toothy"**
= {{During the initial investigation of the premises, MTF Sigma-12 ("Doctor Feelgoods") discovered a deceased child with abnormally high Hume levels relative to the surrounding area.}}
= **by [[*user Vivarium]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP16.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=17
|display-name= DAY 17 - CORPORATE
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-570]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"The Occult Soda War"**
= {{So… Both companies are already aware of this? Then why did you let it happen? Why not stop while you were ahead?}}
= **by [[*user Fishish]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP17.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=18
|display-name= DAY 18 - HOSTILE, INSECT
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-1160]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"Effective Containment"**
= {{The Buzzard tore through our defenses, and we had no choice but to flee to the sea, or take shelter in the earth and pray that it would not root us out.}}
= **by [[*user djkaktus]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP18.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=19
|display-name= DAY 19 - DINOSAURIAN
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-5893]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"Ignitive Stygimolochs"**
= {{I'm looking back at the town. The trees are burning. The fire is spreading. Soon the forest will be red…}}
= **by [[*user Phantom8]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP19.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=20
|display-name= DAY 20 - ESTERBERG
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[Esterberg (City) — Wikipedia]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= {{This article uses outdated nomenclature (such as "anomalous", "paranormal", etc.) to refer to phenomena considered such by the Foundation and associated normalcy organizations prior to November 2021 for ease of access.}}
= **by [[*user Esoterica]], [[*user Jasiu06]], [[*user Jerden]], [[*user Ralliston]], [[*user Zygard]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP20.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=21
|display-name= DAY 21 - BROKEN MASQUERADE
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[Piercing The Veil|Masquerade's End]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= {{THIS DIDN'T SAY IT COULD ERASE WHOLE FUCKING COUNTRIES I THOUGHT WE WERE JUST HUNTING BIGFOOT; GUNS DON'T WORK ON THIS!}}
= **by [[*user Uncle Nicolini]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP21.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=22
|display-name= DAY 22 - IMMOBILE
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-6670]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"Mama?"**
= {{Jemma will have to last the night. We can’t get her the help she needs with people roving the streets. It’s… fuck. Fuck fuck fuck fuck fuck.}}
= **by [[*user Ecronak]], [[*user AnAnomalousWriter]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP22.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=23
|display-name= DAY 23 - MATHEMATICAL
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-001-EX]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"A Good Boy"**
= {{Now everyone is a good boy. I am a good boy. Job well done.}}
= **by [[*user The Great Hippo]], [[*user PeppersGhost]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP23.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=24
|display-name= DAY 24 - OMNIVOROUS
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-6644]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"Foundationi yiputius"**
= {{Well… how could I not? That damned thing hurt my husband. Do you not believe me? Either that or someone wearing a fur suit of some sort.}}
= **by [[*user OzzyLizard]], [[*user Jack Waltz]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP24.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=25
|display-name= DAY 25 - PERFORMANCE
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-5714]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"I Love you to the Cosmos and Back"**
= {{SCP-5714-A instances will re-enter the mesosphere and subsequently combust into ash, entering into an embrace before simultaneous dissipation.}}
= **by [[*user HotColes]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP25.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=26
|display-name= DAY 26 - THREE MOONS INITIATIVE
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-5318]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"Los Ojos de Mi Padre"**
= {{Esas costas secretas tienen una solución, tienen una respuesta. Si no puedo verte a través de mis ojos, te veré a través de los tuyos.}}
= **by [[*user JayKillbam]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP26.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=27
|display-name= DAY 27 - TACTICAL THEOLOGY
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-4967]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"Thaumielvis"**
= {{Though it will take some time, the corpse should be able to convert the city's entire water supply into holy water.}}
= **by [[*user Uncle Nicolini]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP27.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=28
|display-name= DAY 28 - SHADOW
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-4166]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"(Former) Teenage Succubus"**
= {{So I started talking to the only one I felt I could. I started talking to the devil.}}
= **by [[*user DolphinSlugchugger]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP28.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=29
|display-name= DAY 29 - SELACHIAN
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-5384]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"The Late White Shark"**
= {{I have nothing to say except one thing. The Foundation is to blame for this.}}
= **by [[*user CHRISISFUN]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP29.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=dark
|unique-name=30
|display-name= DAY 30 - 7000
]]
= [[size 200%]] **[[[SCP-7166]]]** [[/size]]
[[div style="margin-bottom:-16px;"]]
[[/div]]
= **"Never Strikes Twice"**
= {{Tomorrow. I leave tomorrow. One day more.}}
= **by [[*user WhoIsCthulhu]]**
[[=image http://filedmns2.wdfiles.com/local--files/dokumentoz/SCiP30.jpg]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]
author: Agente Shuffle
